member.name: COLORPROFILESUBTYPE
member.summary: Specifies the subtype of the color profile.

member.name: COLORPROFILESUBTYPE.CPST_PERCEPTUAL
member.summary: A perceptual rendering intent for gamut map model profiles (GMMPs) defined in WCS.

member.name: COLORPROFILESUBTYPE.CPST_RELATIVE_COLORIMETRIC
member.summary: A relative colorimetric rendering intent for GMMPs defined in WCS.

member.name: COLORPROFILESUBTYPE.CPST_SATURATION
member.summary: A saturation rendering intent for GMMPs defined in WCS.

member.name: COLORPROFILESUBTYPE.CPST_ABSOLUTE_COLORIMETRIC
member.summary: An absolute colorimetric rendering intent for GMMPs defined in WCS.

member.name: COLORPROFILESUBTYPE.CPST_NONE
member.summary: The color profile subtype is not applicable to the selected color profile type.

member.name: COLORPROFILESUBTYPE.CPST_RGB_WORKING_SPACE
member.summary: The RGB color working space for International Color Consortium (ICC) profiles or device model profiles (DMPs) defined in WCS.
